Impaling Strike.name: Impaling Strike
Impaling Strike.flavor: You spring into action, expertly strike, and impale your foe on your short pike.
Impaling Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a spear.
Impaling Strike.special: Shift up to 3 squares before making the attack.
Impaling Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Exultant Withdrawal.name: Exultant Withdrawal
Exultant Withdrawal.flavor: Your enemy falls, and you strategically reposition yourself on the battlefield
Exultant Withdrawal.trigger: One of your attacks drops an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer

Taunting Press.name: Taunting Press
Taunting Press.flavor: You adroitly outmaneuver your enemy, pushing and baiting him with every stride and strike.
Taunting Press.requirement: You must be wielding a spear (or short pike).
Taunting Press.effect: Until the end of the encounter, as long as you are adjacent to the target, you slide the target 1 square before making a melee attack against it.
